basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a software engineer who is passionate about working in creative teams and exploring new tools and technologies. I have been in senior positions in some companies around USA and Europe. I am very passionate about UI Design and frontend development. My passion about the previously mentioned fields doesnâ€˜t stop me from constantly diving into the backend and DevOps world and making daring and intelligent decisions to solve complex problems. I am also very passionate about web/mobile application security.

publications.name: SQL Injection in AdoDB
